ResourceHeader.Description:
The PEACE electron analyser provides  the electron velocity distribution function at the satellite in three dimensions with good time, energy, and angular resolution for electron energies up to ~25 keV.

This data set contains  Double Star 2 PEACE prime parameters at spin resolution including  the instrument status, the electron density, electron bulk velocity, electron temperature, and electron heat flux.

Parameter.Name: Double Star 2 PEACE Status Prime Parameter
Parameter.Description: Double Star 2 PEACE status at spin resolution

Parameter.Name: Double Star 2 PEACE Electron Number Density Prime Parameter
Parameter.Description: Double Star 2 PEACE electron number density at spin resolution

Parameter.Name: Double Star 2 PEACE Electron Velocity Prime Parameter
Parameter.Description: Double Star 2 PEACE electron velocity at spin resolution in GSE Coordinates

Parameter.Name: Double Star 2 PEACE Parallel Electron Temperature Prime Parameter
Parameter.Description: Double Star 2 PEACE parallel electron temperature at spin resolution

Parameter.Name: Double Star 2 PEACE Perpendicular Electron Temperature Prime Parameter
Parameter.Description: Double Star 2 PEACE perpendicular electron temperature at spin resolution

Parameter.Name: Double Star 2 PEACE Parallel Electron Heat Flux Prime Parameter
Parameter.Description: Double Star 2 PEACE parallel electron heat flux at spin resolution
